about_the_game:
Story

For some reason, you are moving to a new city to live with your "ex" stepfather. And you will start your new adventure in this new city. Working, meeting "new friends" and most importantly, "falling in love".

Free exploration

You are free to explore a limited area, time passes as you explore, and some citizens or events only appear in certain places at certain times. Hungry? Then go to the restaurant and eat!

Part-time Jobs

The most important thing to live in this city is money, you can work in the bar to earn tips. As the story develops, you can also work at a construction site.

Detective assistant quests

There is an unreliable detective living in the town, become his helper and help him to solve various incidents. In this way, you can not only get a considerable reward, but also understand some of the story of the citizens, and even better, you can increase Juan's goodwill towards you.

Charming Citizens

In addition to the original datable guys, the city is also living many fascinating men. Although you can't date them, there are still some hot events or interesting stories for you to discover.

Multiple Romances

There are some single men in this city waiting for you to meet and date them, develop good feelings and start dating mode to enter a stable relationship. You can be in a steady relationship with all of them at the same time, but it takes a lot of effort to become the saint of love, so challenge your time management skills and patience!

content_descriptors.notes:
The content of this game is not suitable for all ages!
!!! WARNING!!!
。The game content is about gay male theme, contains explicit adult material, including romance, full nudity, sexual scenes, sexual fantasies, non-consensual behavior, BDSM, and adult scenarios set in erotic venues. Please ensure you are comfortable with the content before continuing to play.
。All characters involved in adult content are depicted as adults.

detailed_description:
Story

For some reason, you are moving to a new city to live with your "ex" stepfather. And you will start your new adventure in this new city. Working, meeting "new friends" and most importantly, "falling in love".

Free exploration

You are free to explore a limited area, time passes as you explore, and some citizens or events only appear in certain places at certain times. Hungry? Then go to the restaurant and eat!

The most important thing to live in this city is money, you can work in the bar to earn tips. As the story develops, you can also work at a construction site.

There is an unreliable detective living in the town, become his helper and help him to solve various incidents. In this way, you can not only get a considerable reward, but also understand some of the story of the citizens, and even better, you can increase Juan's goodwill towards you.

You can be in a steady relationship with all of them at the same time, but it takes a lot of effort to become the saint of love, so challenge your time management skills and patience!
name: Hunky City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You move to a new city to live with your "former" stepfather. Work, make friends, and explore the thrilling world of romance in this captivating game. Are you ready for the excitement? Let the journey begin!
